operator.name: Freemarker Writer

synopsis.p: Freemarker Writer operator applies a Freemarker www.freemarker.org template on the RapidMiner ExampleSet

operator.help:
The operator uses the following mapping on the ExamleSet to make it simpler to apply it at a Freemarker



  • ExampleSet -> rows

  • Example -> row

  • Example values -> row.cells

  • Attributes -> columns

  • Attribute -> column

  • Attribute name -> column.name

  • Attribute type -> column.type

  • Attribute value -> cell.value

  • Attribute type -> cell.type

Column type mappings:



  • "nominal" -> TEXT

  • "numeric" -> REAL

  • "integer" -> INTEGER

  • "real" -> REAL

  • "text" -> TEXT

  • "binominal" -> TEXT

  • "polynominal" -> TEXT

  • "file_path" -> TEXT

  • "date_time" -> DATE

  • "date" -> DATE

  • "date" -> DATE
